title: Short-Term Workshop for Strengthening Foreign Language Writing Feedback Competency Based on Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A program aimed at learners in managerial/leadership roles to improve English report-writing skills required in workplace settings, with simulated environments offering realistic feedback processes.

learning_goals: Within one week, learners can provide at least three feedbacks on English report drafts using a peer assessment system.
Learners can identify differences between expert feedback and peer feedback in a VR simulation environment with 80% accuracy.
When writing in English about complex mathematical concepts, learners can generate two feedbacks focused on improving organization/structure.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
